mapper.select: /* common.selectFaqTypeList - FAQ 구분 리스트 조회 */ SELECT CC.CODE_VAL_1 AS FAQ_TYPE_CD , CC.CODE_NAME_1 AS FAQ_TYPE_CD_NAME FROM cm_bo.CM_CODE_TYPE CCT INNER JOIN cm_bo.CM_CODE CC ON CCT.CODE_TYPE_CD = CC.CODE_TYPE_CD AND CC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE CCT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CCT.CODE_TYPE_CD = 'FAQ_TYPE' ORDER BY CC.DIS_ORDER
